item.title: Version 0.12.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.12.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Dock Mode: Sidebar now pushes browser windows aside instead of overlapping them. Windows automatically return to full width when sidebar hides. This mimics the behaviour of inbuilt sidebar in any browser.
  • Smart Folders for Files: Smart folders can now automatically organize files and folders (not just links) based on conditions like file type, path, or name patterns.
  • Save All Tabs to Folder: Quickly save all currently open tabs to a folder with a single action.
  • Custom Pin Icons: Added ability to manually set custom icons for pinned sites.
  • Compact Sidebar View: New sidebar view option that shows only favicons, taking up minimal space.
  • Smart Folder Operations: Smart folders now support the same operations as normal folders, including moving to different spaces.
  • Improved Tab Distinction: Better visual contrast for tabs from different browser windows.
  • Favicons in Live Tabs: Live tabs now show favicons
  • Toolip: Tooltip on hover to get full link and info about link or folder.
  • Swipe to Change Space: Swipe left or right with 2 fingers to move between spaces.
  • Peek View: Cmd + Click to preview link in a mini window.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed issue where clicking the cloud status menu icon would trigger hide on deactivate behavior, causing the sidebar to hide unexpectedly.
  • Fixed critical bug where save shortcut was not working in Arc and Dia browsers.
  • Fixed issue where users were stuck on the onboarding screen.
  • Fixed bug where smart folders and regular folders were not shown until there was at least one link in the space.
